features: Smart Steam Control - The easy-read control automatically regulates and optimizes steam levels based on the temperature setting you select
Spray Mist and Steam Burst Buttons - The side-by-side buttons offer total moisture control. One delivers a burst of steam and the other a gentle spray mist
Easy-fill Water Tank - The water tank is designed for easy filling and features a large capacity
Precision Point Soleplate - The pointed tip of the soleplate makes it easy to navigate around details.
body.description: "From shirts and pants to curtains and drapes, ironing is simple with the BLACK+DECKER One Step Steam Iron. The new design* features the Even Steam Stainless Soleplate, which distributes steam more evenly from heel to tip for fast ironing. The nonstick soleplate effectively smooths out delicate garments and removes even the toughest wrinkles. With Smart Steam Controls, the iron automatically regulates and optimizes steam levels based on the temperature you select for different fabric types. The Precision Point Soleplate makes it simple to navigate around buttons, collars, and creases for crisp, detailed results. Other features include: easy-fill water tank, 3-way automatic shutoff, Auto Clean system, burst of steam, and vertical steam. A full suite of useful features makes BLACK+DECKER the trusted name in clothes irons. *compared to BLACK+DECKER IR05X"

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EvenSteam Stainless Soleplate Even steam distribution from tip to heel helps tame wrinkles anywhere on garments. Smart Steam Control The easy-read control automatically regulates and optimizes steam levels based on the temperature setting you select. Spray Mist and Steam Burst Buttons The side-by-side buttons offer total moisture control. One delivers a burst of steam and the other a gentle spray mist. Easy-fill Water Tank The water tank is designed for easy filling and features a large capacity.

Precision Point Soleplate The pointed tip of the soleplate makes it easy to navigate around details. Features: EvenSteam Stainless Soleplate Smart Steam Control Spray Mist and Steam Burst Buttons Easy-fill Water Tank Precision Point Soleplate 3-Way Auto Shutoff

TrueGlide Premium Nonstick Soleplate The enhanced nonstick soleplate is engineered to glide smoothly across all types of fabrics. High Steam Rate This efficient iron produces a powerful burst for fast wrinkle removal. 3-Way Auto Shutoff For added peace of mind, the iron shuts off when left unattended for 30 seconds on its side or soleplate, and after 8 minutes on the heel rest. Auto Clean System This automatic function flushes out mineral deposits to keep the iron at peak performance. High Steam Rate 3-Way Auto Shutoff Auto Clean System

BLACK+DECKER One Step Steam Iron, Turquoise | IR16X From shirts and pants to curtains and drapes, ironing is simple with the BLACK+DECKER One Step Steam Iron. The new design features the EvenSteam Stainless Soleplate, which distributes steam more evenly from tip to heel* for fast ironing. The nonstick soleplate effectively smooths out delicate garments and removes even the toughest wrinkles. With Smart Steam Controls, the iron automatically regulates and optimizes steam levels based on the temperature you select for different fabric types. The Precision Point Soleplate makes it simple to navigate around buttons, collars, and creases for crisp, detailed results. Other features include: easy-fill water tank, 3-way automatic shutoff, Auto Clean system, burst of steam, and vertical steam. A full suite of useful features makes BLACK+DECKER the trusted name in clothes irons. *compared to BLACK+DECKER IR08X

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, good water capacity
reviews.reviewText: Just got it. Works well, heats quickly, slides easily, and is very maneuverable. Holds plenty of water. I use distilled water to extend appliance life. If it lasts, it represents a great value (despite being made in China).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight and easy to use. Heats up quickly as well. Only downside I found was that it did leak slightly on the first use while it was standing up. Other than that absolutely love it. The steam is also a very nice touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Heats quickly. Steam feature is perfect. Great iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to replace my Rolwenta of 12+ years, and it exceeded my expectations on all points. It is lightweight, heats quickly and delivers great amount of steam. I especially liked how easy it is to fill and the water level is easy to see in the water tank. Appreciated the tip about watching the cord when standing on the heel, but easy to do a quick check and I didn’t find it to be a problem. I don’t know anyone who likes to iron, but this one definitely makes it easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Such a great addition to any laundry routine. The stainless nonstick soleplate glides smoothly over fabrics, effortlessly removing wrinkles. The one-step design makes it easy to switch between steam and dry ironing, saving time and effort. The compact size is perfect for storage and travel. Overall, this iron delivers excellent performance and convenience, making it a reliable choice for keeping your clothes looking crisp and professional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this mostly when I am sewing. It turns itself off and warms up again very quickly when you start to move it.. This product was worth every penny. I paid for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Its making brown spots on my white fabric.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in April of 2023. It has now started dropping brown water on the clothes I am ironing. It also uses alot of water. I cant return it and cant use it for fear of spotting my clothes. I have tried the vinegar and water cleaning trick but its still doing it.
Esta plancha es muy buena y no se pega a la ropa. La recomiendo ampliamente

I have used it only once for 30 minutes and writing a review based on the first experience ---The product was so easy to use and I can iron out the wrinkles in my shirt without much effort. The iron is lightweight, the cord length is fine, the steam works perfectly (Only the first time it spewed water all over), and it has everything you need from a basic iron.
Ligera, muy comoda para usar y cumple lo que indican

reviews.reviewTitle: Black Decter iron is to our satisfaction and good for the value
reviews.reviewText: This is an ideal item; light in weight, very handy and moderately priced.
